post.author: Neurological
post.body:
This is a simple assets pack that contains some of my old work, that got unusued.
I've repacked and reworked some of those assets for this release, nothing major.

The purpose of this pack is just to share some of my work that is just getting dust
and would be wasted.

I've more assets to share, in the future I will pack them up and update.

There is an example map, just load the pack as mod and type in the console: map neurotest

==========================================
Content
==========================================

models
-item large medkit
-item small medkit
-item painkiller
-item ammo box
-item cheese
-item cereals box
-mapobject metalshelf
-mapobject wooden barrel
-mapobject vase
-mapobject mattress
-mapobject cartonbox
-mapobject toolbox
-mapobject circularsaw
-mapobject crowbar
-mapobject sledgehammer
-mapobject toysword

textures
-scifi border trims (2 types)
-scifi floor tiles (3 types)
-medieval brickwall
-medieval cobblefloor
-medieval chesstiles

==========================================
Screenshots
==========================================

http://i48.tinypic.com/11qo6fd.jpg
http://i48.tinypic.com/2la7ejl.jpg
http://i49.tinypic.com/20j5wr7.jpg
http://i48.tinypic.com/4pyw5f.jpg
http://i46.tinypic.com/27ywod2.jpg
http://i47.tinypic.com/20kujc9.jpg
http://i45.tinypic.com/opa9g5.jpg
http://i46.tinypic.com/34y21vs.jpg

==========================================
Download
==========================================

http://games.neuro-lab.net/resources/ne ... pack01.zip

For the future I plan to release some more stuff, I've also some huds and main menus somewhere, plus some weapon. When I got the time I'll repack those too.

You can use the stuff in this pack as you see fit, I only ask for credits in your project, no need to ask me permission to use this, just do it.

post.author: chimueloeldragon2011
post.body:
Hey this is some nice stuff! I, personally, really appreciate the effort you've surely put into this, and of course the will to share it!
I'll consider using some of the sci fi textures and maybe the medkit models.

post.author: whitewolf
post.body: This is really cool. I wish more people would release assets.

post.author: solarsplace
post.body:
Hi Neuro

Well played old chap. Thoroughly decent thing to do releasing those assets!

Cheers

post.author: Tetzlaff
post.body: Many thanks! Some really good textures in there.
